content: प्रयाणं {@--1@} Setting out, starting departure. {@--2@} A march, journey; मार्गं तावच्छृणु कथयतस्त्वत्प्रयाणानुरूपं <ls>Me. 13.</ls> {@--3@} Progress, advance. {@--4@} The march (of an enemy), an attack, invasion, expedition; कामं पुरः शुक्रमिव प्रयाणे <ls>Ku. 3. 43</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 33.</ls> {@--5@} Beginning, commencement. {@--6@} Death, departure (from the world); <ls>Bg. 7. 30.</ls> {@--7@} The back of a horse. {@--8@} The hinder part of any animal.
